Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: (Relazione) “Capitale sociale, associazioni e democrazia deliberativa: associazioni e attivisti a Firenze”, Conferenza SISP, Università di Genova, Genova.
(Relazione) “Social Movements and Public Sphere: The Case of Italy during the 1990s", ECPR joint session, Edimburgo.
(Relazione) “Social movements and the Public Sphere: the case of Italy during the 90th“, Graduate Conference on “Globalization, conflicts, and social movements”, Università di Trento.
(Relazione) “Forms of Europeanization of the public sphere in Italy in a cross-time, cross-issue and cross-media perspective” International Conference WZB (Berlin Social Science Center ), Berlino.

(Relazione) “Forms of Europeanization of the Public Sphere in Italy in a Cross-time, Cross-issue and Cross-media perspective”, 19th Conferenza mondiale IPSA (International Political Science Association), Durban, South Africa
(Relazione) “Europeanisation and the Civil Society in the Public Sphere: Some results from a research on claims-making in Italy”, ECPR Conference- Joint Session, Uppsala, Svezia.
(Relazione) “The Europeanisation of Public Opinion? Public Debates and Images of Europe in a Cross-time”, ECPR Conference, Budapest.
(Relazione), “Addressing Europe: How domestic actors perceive European institutions and how they try to influence them”, International Conference on ‘Resisting Europe’, Université libre de Bruxelles.
(Relazione) “Frames e discorso di estrema destra. L'esempio della destra radicale tedesca”, Conferenza SISP, Università di Bologna.
(Relazione) “Networks e mobilitazione sull’Europa: quale la partecipazione dei movimenti sociali?”, Conferenza SISP , Università di Catania.
(Relazione) “The Other ‘No Global’: the discourses of extreme right groups on globalization”, International Cortona Colloquium, Fondazione Feltrinelli, Cortona.
(Relazione) “Populism and Civil Society”, Cinefogo-CONNEX’s workshop, European University Institute, Firenze.
(Relazione) “Radicalization processes of young people: the analysis of extreme right groups in Italy and Germany”, ESF workshop on “Youth and Radicalization”, Metropolitan University, Londra.
“Movimenti sociali (radicali) e mobilitazione online: Il caso Italiano”, Conferenza SISP, Università di Pavia.
Panel Chair “On the Borderline between Protest and Violence: Political Movements of the New Radical Right”, ECPR General Conference, Potsdam, Germania.
(Relazione), “How Many Extreme Rights’? Subcultural Right-Wing Organisations in Italy and Germany”, ECPR General Conference, Università di Potsdam, Germania.
Panel Chair (con Marchi, R.), “Oltre partiti ed elezioni: una nuova destra radicale europea?”, Conferenza SISP (Società Italiana di Scienza Politica), Roma.
(Relazione) “Structural, Cognitive and Action Components of Processes of Radicalization”, START Annual Conference, Università del Maryland, Washington DC.
(Relazione) Conferenza ECPR Joint session (workshop 7 ‘Network Governance and the Governance of Networks: Social Network Analysis in Political Science’), Università di Munster, Germania.
(Relazione) “Cambiamenti culturali per l’estrema destra", Conferenza SISP, Università di Venezia.
(Relazione), Conferenza Annuale START (Centro per lo studio del Terrorismo e Contro Terrorismo), Università del Maryland, Washington DC (USA).
(Relazione) "Radical Rgiht Processes of Radicalization and De-Radicalization", Center for Interdisciplinary Studies (ZIF), Università di Bielefeld, Germania.

(Relazione) 1. “Social Movements and Identity building, Mobilization and Organization"; 2.“Between violent and non-violent action strategies: a comparative study”, Conferenza ECPR, Università Reykjavik, Islanda.

Panel Chair (con Profeti, S.) “Reti, arene e altre metafore: l'analisi delle configurazioni decisionali e di potere nelle politiche locali”, Conferenza SISP (Società Italiana di Scienza Politica), Palermo.
(Relazione), “Freedom of Speach or Hate Speach? The European and American Radical Righ and their use of the Web”, John Jay International Conference, at John Jay College, New York
(Relazione), “Populism and Politics on the Web: A Comparative Analysis on Five Western Democracies”, Conferenza IPSA (International Political Science Association), University Computense, Madrid.
(Relazione), “Radicalisation and the Discourse of Race and Religion in Western Democracies", Conferenza ESA (European sociological Association), Lisbona.

Panel Chair (con Moro, F.) “Quando finisce la violenza Politica: Dinamiche di contesto ed individuali di uscita dal conflitto”, Conferenza SISP (Società Italiana di Scienza Politica), Università Roma3, Roma.

Panel Chair 1 (con Moro, F.) “How violence ends: Micro, meso and macro analysis of insurgents, terrorists, and the way out of conflict”; Panel Chair 2 “Extreme Right Mobilisation in Western Democracies and the Middle East in the Era of Globalisation and Economic Crisis”, Conferenza ECPR (Consortium for Political Research), Università di Bordeaux.
